summary: This bill, HR 4372, aims to amend Title 10 of the United States Code to increase transparency and oversight of Department of Defense cost overruns. It focuses on shortening breach reporting timelines, defining major subprograms, including operations and support costs, and establishing stricter rules for programs facing critical cost growth issues, including termination and public availability of reports. The bill also prevents the Secretary from delegating the submission of written certifications.
